title: Any Future of champion shard when i own all champ?
body: Soo i keep getting champion shard from the chest, any future update for this?? can't do anything about it

replies.body: You can use champion shards, in combination with mastery tokens, to upgrade your mastery level of that champion to level 6 or 7. Or, you can disenchant the champion shards for blue essence and upgrade your mastery level that way as well.
Hi! Can you message me on Discord (Wuks#5471) or add me on my alternate account? (:
Yeah, I sent a friend request on Discord.

Zombiemaster has some great info on what to do with additional blue essences.  We don't have any other updates or options for now, and the chests remain to be random.  To add to Zombiemaster, you can also check out our [champion mastery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide on how it's used.  Hope that helps!
